AboutPage.title: About AITC
AboutPage.heading: Partnering with Global Leaders, Empowering Saudi Mining

description.paragraph1: Founded in 2015, Addaan International Trading Company (AITC) is a leading provider of mining and exploration solutions in Saudi Arabia. We combine local manufacturing expertise with strong global partnerships to deliver innovative, high-quality products and technical services.
description.paragraph2: Starting as the sole agent for Desco rigs in 2017, and later expanding with IMDEX and CR Mining, we continue to pioneer industry-first solutions.
description.paragraph3: Our locally manufactured core trays, approved by Ma'aden, reflect our alignment with Saudi Vision 2030 and commitment to local content development.

features.0: Nearly a decade of leadership in mining solutions
features.1: Global partnerships with IMDEX, CR Powered by Epiroc, and Desco
features.2: State-of-the-art Rabigh facility producing core trays

heading.label: About AITC
heading.title: Partnering with Global Leaders, Empowering Saudi Mining
heading.description: Founded in 2015, Addaan International Trading Company (AITC) is a leading provider of mining and exploration solutions in Saudi Arabia. We combine local manufacturing expertise with strong global partnerships to deliver innovative, high-quality products and technical services tailored to the mining industry.

cards.label: Our Mission
cards.title: Deliver cutting-edge mining solutions that drive efficiency, sustainability, and industrial growth in alignment with Saudi Vision 2030.

cards.label: Our Vision
cards.title: To lead the mining sector in technology, sustainability, and local manufacturing.

heading.label: Our Journey
heading.title: Our Achievements
heading.description: A decade of innovation and excellence in the mining industry

2015.title: Establishing First Impressions
2015.description: Addaan International Trading Company (AITC) was founded, embarking on a mission to revolutionize the mining sector with innovative solutions.

2016.title: Market Analysis and Vision
2016.description: Initiated market research to identify gaps in the mining industry, aligning efforts with Saudi Vision 2030 to drive growth and sustainability.

2017.title: Strategic Partnerships
2017.description: Secured partnerships with leading drilling brands and charted a clear roadmap to become a comprehensive provider of mining technology solutions.

2018.title: Smart Solutions
2018.description: Formed a strategic alliance with IMDEX, delivering cutting-edge logging and data solutions for the mining and exploration industries.

2019.title: Resilience During COVID-19
2019.description: Successfully navigated the challenges of the pandemic, maintaining robust business operations and delivering exceptional client support.

2020.title: Saudi-Made Innovations
2020.description: Pioneered the first Saudi-made core boxes, reducing reliance on imports and championing local manufacturing in line with Vision 2030.

2021.title: Rapid Expansion
2021.description: Expanded significantly, deploying over 18 DESCO rigs across Saudi Arabia, reinforcing AITC's position as a market leader.

2022.title: Core Tray Milestone
2022.description: Achieved sales of more than 200,000 core trays nationwide, while focusing on product enhancements and raw material development.

2023.title: Record-Breaking Year
2023.description: Celebrated the company's most successful year, setting new records in growth, client satisfaction, and industry impact.

2024.title: The Bronze Year
2024.description: Surpassed 250,000 core boxes sold. Established Saudi Arabia's first IMDEX repair centre, enhancing service efficiency and strengthening client relationships.

2025.title: The Silver Year
2025.description: Continuing a legacy of innovation and excellence with anticipated achievements in technology and market expansion.
